com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit

Class Campaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.Campaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Campaign
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The Campaign class represents a single Campaign created within your Kit.

    A Campaign is sent in the CampaignKitNotifier#didFindCampaign(Campaign) method whenever the Android device has become close enough to a Place associated with that Campaign to trigger it.

    See Also:
    CampaignKitNotifier.didFindCampaign(Campaign), CampaignKitManager, Place, Serialized Form

      • updateCampaign

        @Deprecated
protected void updateCampaign(Campaign newCampaign)
        Deprecated. Not for public use. As of 0.14.0 this method could possibly be retained only as a private method.
        Not for public use.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - As of 0.15.0 this is thrown when newCampaign is not equal to this campaign.

      • getIdAsInt

        @Deprecated
public int getIdAsInt()
        Deprecated. As of 0.15.0 no replacement; use Campaign.getId(). This will be removed in the next major release.
        This campaign's entity identifier coerced to an integer
        Returns:
        this campaign's entity identifier coerced to an integer or 0 if the id is missing or coercion failed.

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Returns the entity identifier for this campaign.

        Prior to version 0.15.0 it was possible for this method to return null. However, such an id is meaning less and represents an invalid campaign. Since 0.15.0 if any such campaigns exist this will return a valid string with the benign place holder Campaign.MISSING_ID.

        Returns:
        the entity identifier for this campaign.

      • getEndAt

        public Date getEndAt()
        Time this campaign ends (i.e. expires)
        Returns:
        the end time for this campaign; null indicates the campaign is invalid

      • getStartAt

        public Date getStartAt()
        Start time of this campaign
        Returns:
        the start time for this campaign; null indicates the campaign is invalid

        public boolean isForegroundOnly()

        public String getTitle()

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage()
        Message for an alert or notification.
        Returns:
        the simple content message for this campaign

      • getBody

        public String getBody()
        HTML content to be displayed in a webview.
        Returns:

      • getAttributes

        public Map getAttributes()
        Content specific metadata.
        Returns:
        map of attribute associated with this campaign's content

        As of 0.15.0 this returns an unmodifiable map. Attempts to modify it will throw UnsupportedOperationException

      • foundAt

        public Place foundAt()
        Place where the campaign was last found (i.e. campaign was triggered)
        Returns:
        Place instance where this campaign was last found; or null if this campaign has never been triggered

      • canDetect

        public boolean canDetect()
        Checks whether this campaign can be detected at the current time.

        Campaigns may be detected if they have not been previously detected or if they have a recurrence interval which has elapsed.

        Returns:
        true if campaign can be detected now, false otherwise

      • checkIsConnectedToRedemptionPlace

        @Deprecated
protected boolean checkIsConnectedToRedemptionPlace(String stringData)
        Deprecated. Not for public use. As of 0.14.0, no replacement.
        Not for public use.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object other)
        Two campaigns are equal if they have the same id.

        As of 0.15.0 campaigns with missing ids are only equal to themselves (i.e. instance equality).

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        other - the object to compare this instance with.
        Returns:
        true if the specified object is equal to this Campaign; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Campaign.getId()

        Returns an integer hash code for this campaign.

        Returns:
        this campaigns's hash code.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getTriggerDistance

        public Double getTriggerDistance()
        Approximate distance (in meters) to be within before campaign can be triggered by a beacon.

        A null value indicates the campaign can trigger at any distance.

        Returns:
        approximate distance (in meters), greater than zero, the device needs to be to a beacon to trigger this campaign; null indicates the campaign can be triggered at any distance.
